results.address: 322 N 1st Ave, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 55401
results.raw: Two Killed, Eight Injured in Downtown Minneapolis Shooting at 322 N 1st Ave, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 55401
results.rawLocation: 322 N 1st Ave, Minneapolis, Minnesota, 55401
results.title: Two Killed, Eight Injured in Downtown Minneapolis Shooting

-MaHrmRky0QLLPGFn0Qt.text: Police have received an unconfirmed report of a man brandishing a gun.

-MaHsdL2vyRP9flE6g49.text: Police are on the scene investigating.

-MaHy4aVzYPZGVhn-JtY.text: The address reported for this incident has changed to 322 N 1st Ave.

-MaHyGmOeZ9Vy4jdf3-Y.text: Police have confirmed at least three people were shot.

-MaHyQthyX0dWPf02TbB.text: Units have determined there is one suspect, a man, and advise he remains at large.

-MaHyYBxUdW3iVzvdO13.text: EMS is on scene tending to the injured people. At least one is considered to have sustained life-threatening injuries.

-MaHyjB9q8jyX4bOfwrz.text: First responders report one person has been shot in the neck.

nib.text:
Two people were killed and eight were injured in a downtown Minneapolis shooting early Saturday morning, police say. 

At 1:49 a.m., police responded to a report of a man armed with a gun near 408 Hennepin Avenue. Shortly after, police officers near the 300 block of North 1st Avenue heard gunshots in the area. 

The officers located the scene, where [local](https://kstp.com/news/minneapolis-shooting-two-dead-eight-injured/6117555/) and [national](https://www.cnn.com/2021/05/22/us/minneapolis-shooting-2-killed/index.html) news sources said they found multiple people with gunshot wounds. 

Two men were pronounced dead at the scene. 

Police and EMS eventually located eight additional victimsthree men and five womenat what officials described as an "exceptionally chaotic scene."

Seven of these victims are reportedly being treated in area hospitals for injuries that are not considered life-threatening, while one victim is in critical condition. 

Minneapolis Police officials stated that all of the victims are adults. 

A preliminary investigation revealed that two people engaged in a verbal argument in the crowded downtown neighborhood. Both individuals then reportedly brandished guns and began to fire shots at one another, according to local news sources. 

An investigation is ongoing and the Medical Examiner will release further information about the victims in the coming days.
